tool_description: This API takes any text in English and rewrites it with simple words and constructions.
name: English text simplifier
title: English text simplifier

api_list.name: /v1/simplify
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://english-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com/v1/simplify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://english-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com/v1/simplify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
